titles.title: To amend title V of the Trade Act of 1974 to add to the eligibility criteria for the Generalized System of Preferences full cooperation with the United States in preventing illegal drug traffic and the entry of illegal drugs into the United States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 9/28/1996--Introduced. Amends the Trade Act of 1974 to add to the criteria for eligibility for the Generalized System of Preferences full cooperation with the United States in preventing illegal drug traffic and the entry of illegal drugs into the United States.
